Detailed Description

Allows user to modify application settings.

Upon construction the dialog takes its settings from the application's current settings (Application::GetSettings). Example usage: 

   OptionsDialog dlg(this);
   if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
     const Settings& settings = dlg.GetSettings();

     // merge settings with application settings
     wxGetApp().GetSettings().Merge(settings);
   }

See also:
Settings

bool OptionsDialog::TransferDataFromWindow (  ) 

Pulls the data out of the controls and modifies the settings object before closing the window.

Moves settings from controls to settings object.

The modified settings should be accessible from the GetSettings method after closing the window.

See also:
GetSettings

Here is the call graph for this function:

void OptionsDialog::TransparencyChanged ( wxScrollEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles the transparency slider to automatically adjust the main window transparency (for preview purposes).

The transparency should be reset by the caller when the dialog closes.
